name: digdugz
text: Oh Pat, how I love thee.

name: glopdemon
text: A comment left by glopdemon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, straw, riotdejaneiro, Mangtastic, BionicVapourBoy, fell, n00b, bug, Bertson, unquotable, NDCaesar, pete, CarlG, alejandroadam, stormagnet, gnjdfsgk, afvbs)

name: saint
text:
i love how you got lamed just because of agreeing with racism. they were probably all mexicans...well, I'll bet I can get more racism-generated lames than YOU.

all Chinese people look alike.

name: buttermoths
text: A comment left by buttermoths was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Scorpio_nadir, Zem, gorrioncita, Direhaggis, Zoe)

name: rainwolfj
text: A comment left by rainwolfj was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, tasteful, mercuri0us)

name: bika
text:
Due to the lack of lames, I have to assume no Chinese people have read the strip since Philippe refused to wipe Ultra Peanut's ass.

Insulting

name: dissembly
text:
I actually think the lack of lames is a whole bunch of people who *would* have lamed it just letting you know they're onto you.

You have, like, 130 invisible inverse-lames for the lame whining about political correctness.

name: soticoto
text:
Bitch please.
Like any yank can out-do a Brit at racism.
We invented racism.
The proximity of the French basically justified it.
It got so severe they've had to pass laws about it here... The only folks who do it better are the Japanese, but then those nipples strive to do everything better since america shat all over them back in WW2.
That is basically what america does.
Shits all over everything.


[So... Do I win the racism-prize of over 9000 lames yet?]

name: nighttoad
text: really? in what situation would you have to wait for a mexican stranger to get into their car?

name: sdskyle
text: A comment left by sdskyle was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Mangtastic, atticusonline)

name: achilleselbow
text: It's not that individual Mexicans take long to get out of cars, it's just that there's usually like 12 of them inside.

name: i_love_kate
text: All yelling at each other in their heathen language, trying to decide who's turn it is to go and suck the petrol out of someone else's care...

name: i_love_kate
text:
*car

Rocking a six-month late correction here, peeps.

name: mercuri0us
text: Come on, man.  "Heathen" is a bit much.

name: i_love_kate
text: I have never met a Mexican. I don't think.

name: sustainability
text: It's necessary; it's what a real racist would not say. It reveals the fact that the author is attempting to be humorous. At least that's how I think it works, but the only Mexican I've met was in your mother's bed.

name: mercuri0us
text: Yeah, that's just Jesus.  He does the lawns on Wednesdays.

name: atticusonline
text: What is up with mexican folk always having splotches white paint on their arms and on their trucks... even if they are not of the painting persuasion.

name: sweetlips
text: A comment left by sweetlips was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Mangtastic, deus)

name: epicurus
text: The only "Mexican" guy I know seemed pretty quick to get into a car, but he was WAY more sober than I was at the time.

name: leon_sumbitches
text: He must not be hiding too hard if he can spare to call the radio station on a regular basis.

name: atypicaloracle
text: It's only that Pat can't resist the burning need to be a titanic dong at any time.

name: zefiel
text: I take a long time to get in the car. It's in my mexican genes.

name: mortshire
text: Now us scots, we're fuckin' glacial.

name: nathanielperson
text: The Albanians and Chileans are known for their promptness when entering vehicles. New Zealanders, curiously, take forever getting in but are out like a shot.

name: overmedicated
text: I'm a Yorkshireman. I don't have a car.

name: killerlimpet
text:
I'm a hippy. My bike has a flat and I'm too cheap to buy a patch kit.
I have to be a 30-minute walk away in 20 minutes, yet I still keep reading...

name: jargonmaster
text: Us Irish are, unfortunately, the #1 group for hitting our heads off of the car while getting in. Please support Irish and people of Irish descent who have whacked their foreheads off the car - buy a t-shirt, or get a pop culture reference shaved into your hair. This week's recommendation: Google.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Being Irish and having witnessed Irish society all my life, I believe this phenomenon is explained by the principle of natural selection.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Also, many Irish people entering cars are drunk.

name: ravindra108
text:
I am Irish, and I have a scar above my eyebrow from opening a car door into my head. You'd think that after more than a quarter century of life, almost every day of which included opening several car doors, that this would be a virtual impossibility. But I grabbed that handle and pulled the door right into my own face.

I'm not proud of it, but there you go.

name: mercuri0us
text: That's becuase somebody farted in there.

name: singtralala
text: ju have mexican genes? maybe ju and i are amigooos!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: hermanooooooos

name: centipede_damascus
text: As a German, I am quick and efficient whether getting out or in of my automobile. I do have a tendency to slam the door though.

name: rodneystubbs
text: We Germans are indeed the perfect balance of efficiency, anger, and industrial metal.

name: direhaggis
text: You all are like woodchipers?

name: jaredwilde
text: This made me laugh harder than anything else on this site. THANK YOU

name: vweep
text: Is SO much more funny to be had.

name: charchar
text: I am also German-ish; however, my Teutonic efficiency id counter-balanced by my Norman voluptousness which requires me to savour the moment( The mingled odours of leather, diesel, and hope just have this effect on me.)

name: greenkoolayd
text:
voluptousness you say...... [[ponders]]


wait..... i apologize for being a creep.

name: soticoto
text: She is basically one of the ghosts from mario. They're very voluptuous.

name: _cheesekayke
text:
"Acting like the world was his oyster?"
Oysters are the most WASP-ish food ever. No Mexican man is going to put his universe into a friggin' OYSTER.

name: zefiel
text: Now, don't take my word for it, because i've never even eaten one of those disgusting things, but most mexicans will NOT reject an Oyster with lime juice and a dash of hot sauce.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Peoples all over the world enjoy the delicious oyster. Do not claim it for WASPS.

name: foea
text: Many WASPS don't eat seafood at all. I'm thinking the official food is probably something involving boneless, skinless chicken breasts.

name: bovine
text: oh man I just pictured a woman that has a dog in a stroller and in work out on shorts getting all indignant that her chicken breast has some oil and skin on it.

name: imbeta
text: Ha ha ha - that so ridiculous it's awesome.

name: direhaggis
text: Pat has a warped sense of Colored People Time.

name: nyu
text: Also, fat people. They act like they are setting up for the moon landing or something.

name: daaaaang
text:
making up racial stereotypes is la bamba.

Irish people sleep too much / Swedish people can%u2019t walk longer than 20 minutes / Russians hate chocolate

name: chilibone
text:
Spanish people can't turn left, so they always have to circle right.

Korean sweat tastes like apple juice.

Venezuelans are allergic to modular furniture.

name: tekende
text: We Irish sleep so much because we're hung over. We like to skip a day now and then.

name: sex_bicycle
text: If a non-irish person ever complains about me sleeping so long again that's my excuse and i'm sticking to it!

name: sex_bicycle
text:
assetbar should have a damn edit button

Edit: obviously an irish person wouldn't complain about me sleeping they probably got up the same time as me

name: greenkoolayd
text: pat called into the radio station last week to bitch about black dudes causing a grape soda shortage.
